content:
I'm happy to help! However, I think there might be some confusion. As a conversational AI, I don't have the ability to know about your personal experiences or attend physical events like writing workshops. I'm a large language model, I don't have personal experiences or memories, and I don't have the capability to attend physical events.

But I'd be happy to help you reflect on your experience and provide guidance on the writing process if you'd like to share more about the workshop and what you learned from it. Please feel free to share your thoughts, and I'll do my best to help you process and build upon your experience.
